issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Description:
While testing Phone>Sound>Remote streaming, I started a stream via the "Start Streaming" button and then tapped the "Pause streaming" button. Attempting to restart the paused stream, I tapped "Unpause streaming" and nothing happened.

Steps to reproduce:
1) Install KS 1.8.0 on Nexus S
2) Navigate to Phone>Sound>Remote streaming
3) Tap "start streaming" 
4) When sound is heard, tap "Pause streaming"
5) When sound stops, tap "unease streaming"


Result:
Nothing happens

Expected result:
The stream continues where it left off

Notes:
Also occurs with 1.7.2
fields.summary: Kitchensink: Phone>Sound>Remote streaming "unpause streaming" button does not unpause stream as expected.
fields.environment: Titanium Studio, build: 1.0.4.201108101535, SDK 1.8.0.v20110819142548 on Nexus S 2.3.4

comments.body: Resolving ticket as invalid as this version of Kitchen Sink is no longer supported.
